description:
Two groups each containing 4 tiles of the same type 
 in a 2x2 square
Two columns each formed by 6 different types of tiles

Four groups each containing at least 4 tiles of the 
 same that may differ for each group

Six groups each containing at least 2 tiles of the 
 same type that may differ for each group

Three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three 
 different types
Two lines each formed by 5 different types of tiles

Four lines each formed by 5 tiles of maximum three 
 different types

Four tiles of the same type in the four corners of 
 the bookshelf

Eight tiles of the same type. Thereâ€™s no restriction 
 about the position of these tiles
Five tiles of the same type forming an X
Five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal

Five columns of increasing or decreasing height from 
 the left to the right
